snippet: As supporters of a law to legalize same-sex marriage celebrated over the Senate’s passing the measure, religious groups promised to start collecting referendum signatures as soon as the measure was signed into law.
abstract: Supporters of a law to legalize same-sex marriage celebrate over Washington State Senate’s passing the measure, but at the same time religious groups promise to start collecting referendum signatures as soon as the measure is signed into law.
lead_paragraph: As supporters of a law to legalize same-sex marriage celebrated over the Senate’s passing the measure, religious groups promised to start collecting referendum signatures as soon as the measure was signed into law.

headline.main: Washington: Foes of Gay Marriage Vow to Fight Law
headline.print_headline: Washington: Foes of Gay Marriage Vow To Fight Law

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
